doc.after: The Story of the Kelly Gang 1906 the world s first feature length film spurred a boom in Australian cinema during the silent film era 318 After World War I Hollywood monopolised the industry 319 and by the 1960s Australian film production had effectively ceased 320 With the benefit of government support the Australian New Wave of the 1970s brought provocative and successful films many exploring the nation s colonial past such as Picnic at Hanging Rock and Breaker Morant 321 while the so called Ozploitation genre produced international blockbusters including the Mad Max series 322 More recent successes included Shine and Rabbit Proof Fence 323 324 Notable Australian actors include Errol Flynn Judith Anderson Geoffrey Rush Nicole Kidman Heath Ledger and Cate Blanchett 325
